socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Annual mean cost of L-carnitine supplementation and medical consultations per patient
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Cost-effectiveness analysis of universal newborn screening for medium chain acyl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency in France

justification: A peer-reviewed economic analysis from a high-income country (France) provided annual treatment cost estimates (â‚¬5,831 per patient for L-carnitine supplementation and consultations), fitting the criteria for medium-high evidence.
